## Who am I?

-   My name is Kyleigh and I am a master's student in the biology program with Dr. Bukaveckas
-   I went to ODU for my undergrad
-   I love environmental science woooo!!!

## Bivalves FTW

-   I worked with oysters (*Crassostrea virginica*) and oyster aquaculture at VIMS in my undergrad summers
-   Now interested in ***all bivalves***
-   Fingers crossed I get to study freshwater mussels and nutrient cycling here at VCU
